summary: Comprehensive testing of Smart Unified Upload feature (US-ING-001). All backend API tests passed (14/14). Frontend E2E flow tested successfully including smart upload, auto-detection, header normalization, currency settings, validation, identity review, and dashboard currency display.
passed_tests: API health check at /api/
POST /api/sessions - create session
POST /api/sessions/{sid}/smart-upload - upload accounts with aliased headers (acct_id -> account_id)
POST /api/sessions/{sid}/smart-upload - upload customers with aliased headers (cust_id -> customer_id)
POST /api/sessions/{sid}/smart-upload - upload subscriptions
POST /api/sessions/{sid}/smart-upload - upload invoices with aliased headers and enum normalization
POST /api/sessions/{sid}/smart-upload - upload multiple CSVs at once
POST /api/sessions/{sid}/smart-upload - upload ZIP file containing multiple CSVs
POST /api/sessions/{sid}/smart-validate - soft validation + identity matching
POST /api/sessions/{sid}/smart-validate - returns errors for missing required files
PUT /api/sessions/{sid}/settings - update currency and period settings
POST /api/synthetic - generates session with all 6 file types
Full E2E flow: synthetic -> validate -> identity -> analyze -> dashboard
All 6 template downloads working (/api/templates/{file_type})
UI: Smart drop zone visible and interactive
UI: Template downloads (6 badges) displayed
UI: Load Synthetic Data button works
UI: Detection results card shows file types with confidence badges
UI: Header normalization summary displayed
UI: Enum normalization summary displayed
UI: Settings card with currency selector and date pickers
UI: Validate & Match button triggers smart-validate
UI: Proceed button navigates to Identity Review
UI: Identity Review shows auto-matched, needs review, unmatched counts
UI: Fuzzy match confirmation works
UI: Run Analysis button triggers analysis
UI: Processing page shows all 5 steps completing
UI: Dashboard shows score, coverage, revenue at risk
UI: Dashboard uses session currency symbol (EUR -> â‚¬)
UI: Reset button clears uploaded data and session
UI: Logo visible in sidebar
seed_data_creation: Used synthetic data generator for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Smart upload feature (US-ING-001) fully tested. New endpoints: /api/sessions/{sid}/smart-upload (multi-file/ZIP), /api/sessions/{sid}/smart-validate (soft validation). Header aliasing (e.g. acct_id->account_id) and enum normalization (e.g. settled->paid) working. Currency settings persist to Dashboard. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_smart_upload.py.
